text: ذوقوا۟ فتنتكم هذا الذى كنتم به تستعجلون

translations.translation: 'Taste your torment! This is what you were trying to hasten!'
(And told:) "Taste your punishment. This is what you were trying to hasten."
(and be told): “Taste your ordeal! This is what you were seeking to hasten.”
and will be told, "Suffer the torment which you wanted to experience immediately".
And it will be said to them, “Taste your own roasting; this is what you were impatient for.”
Taste you your trial! This is what you used to ask to be hastened!"
Taste your persecution! this is what you would hasten on.
Taste your trial! This is that you were seeking to hasten.'
(And it will be said unto them): Taste your torment (which ye inflicted). This is what ye sought to hasten.
Taste your trial. This is what you sought to hasten."
Taste your burning: this is that which ye sought to be hastened.
[and will be told]: ‘Taste your torment. This is what you used to hasten.’
Taste ye your trial! This is what ye used to ask to be hastened!"
Taste you your trial (burning)! This is what you used to ask to be hastened!"
Taste your trial. This is what you have sought to hasten'
“Taste your ordeal. This is what you used to challenge.”
[And will be told], "Taste your torment. This is that for which you were impatient."
[51:14] ‘Taste this torment of yours, this chastisement of yours. This, chastisement, is what you sought to hasten on!’, in the world in derision.
610 The angels of the Fire will say to them: (Taste your torment. This) chastisement (is what ye sought to hasten) in the life of the world.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text:
ويقول لهم الموكلون حين طرحهم فيها توبيخاً وتقريعاً: { ذُوقُواْ } أيها المجرمون المسرفون { فِتْنَتَكُمْ } التي أنتم تستعجلون بها في دار الدنيا على سبل الاستهزاء والمراء
 وبالجملة: { هَـٰذَا ٱلَّذِي } وقعتم فيه
 وحبستم عليه الآن من العذاب { كُنتُمْ بِهِ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ } [الذاريات: 14] في سالف الزمان على سبيل الإنكار والاستكبار
